main event: A milk plant operator named Jim Tilly and his family observed a bright elliptical object hovering over Toledo, Ohio for about 1.5 hours on July 5, 1967.
interesting points: The object was described as a brilliant light and elliptical in shape,The object hovered a few hundred feet off the ground then suddenly accelerated away at an incredible speed,At least 3 other witnesses in the vicinity confirmed they saw the same object,The report was sent to the Air Force for further investigation,The object faded out of sight after a prolonged observation period.
witnesses: Jim Tilly and family, and 3 other witnesses in the area
